title: Quality food and wine
text:
I went with my partner and we both were very enthusiastic about the quality of food and the good taste of wine.

We ate an amazing starting of grilled Greek cheese and then fish, all accompanied with a very tasty white wine from their wine yard.

Very great experience

title: Amazing food
text:
We bumped into this restaurant by chance and it was a great discovery!
Ratio quality / food very high. We ate very much and we spent very few

title: A must!
text:
The more you walk into the Acropolis and the more you imagine how Greeks were actually living centuries ago.
It's a must to see and to discover

title: A jump into the history!
text:
A must see temple if you are going to the Acropolis.
If you are going to Athens, then you ought to go in here

title: One of the most important museums in the world
text:
After you visited the Acropolis a half-day (at least) stop at the national museum is a must.
You will discover everything about the Greek culture starting from millennials ago to the great age of Greece.
I would spend a week inside admiring everything!
